description:
Helping recover fair and reasonable compensation, we provide dedicated personal injury services at the law firm of Hill & Associates, P.C. Serving people in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, and throughout the surrounding area, our attorneys tirelessly pursue financial justice on behalf of those injured through no fault of their own. For our clients' safety and convenience, we offer free initial consultations, as well as virtual appointment options.

Our law firm team has more than five decades of combined legal experience. We have built our careers on holding businesses and people accountable for negligence or carelessness that caused serious injuries or death to others. Our attorneys aggressively advocate on behalf of our clients' rights and interests in negotiations with the insurance companies or, if necessary, in the courtroom.

Our experience includes assisting clients with cases involving matters such as the following:

• Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
• Medical malpractice and birth injuries
• Nursing home abuse
• Brain injury
• Premises liability
• Construction accidents

At the law firm of Hill & Associates, P.C., we work closely with each of our clients, providing personalized assistance and responsive support. Our attorneys carefully review with clients the circumstances that led to their injuries and how their injuries have affected their and their families' lives before offering counsel tailored to their unique situations, needs and legal objectives. Our law firm accepts credit card payments.
